job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description:
We are looking for a Software Engineer III to join our growing engineering team and contribute in building out the next generation of our cloud analytics platform. The ideal candidate for this position shall be able to analyze and develop software in our critical data-driven software platforms in order to meet the needs of our external stakeholders while adhering to our client’s software development processes. The ideal candidate is a hands-on technically savvy individual with experience in cloud-based architecture/infrastructure.
The Software Engineer is responsible for the software development process, including the research, design, programming, and testing of computer software. The Software Engineer will also help to develop critical products for our clients, and offer technical support. The Software Engineer is expected to be proficient in application of theories and principles of Computer Science
Essential Duties & Responsibilities
:
Mentor, support, & develop software engineers by providing advice and coaching
Maintains exceptional communication skills with an ability to effectively listen to other team members & management
Measure system performance and health, determine bottlenecks, and recommend/implement optimizations
Improve operations by conducting systems analysis; recommending changes in policies and procedures
Capable of delivering on priorities in a timely fashion with limited supervision
Continuously updating job knowledge by studying state-of-the-art development tools, programming techniques and computing equipment; participating in educational opportunities; reading professional publications; maintaining personal networks; participating in professional organization
Passionate about great technologies, especially open source, with willingness to “go deep” into the technology
Research/learn new technologies/frameworks to be able to teach them to the team
Tech Stack
:
Unit Testing
Cloud Infrastructure (AWS and/or Azure)
Entity Framework - ORMs
SQL experience
Has worked in an agile environment
C#
.NET
Detailed Work Activity
:
Perform intensive validation & verification testing
Creatively break down and solve complex problems using exceptional analytical skills
Write clean, readable, maintainable, and reusable code ensuring that all code meets program requirements
Provide feedback on technical and operational feasibility of proposed software projects/solutions by evaluating analysis, problem definition, requirements, solution development, and proposed solutions
Develop software solutions by examining information needs; consulting with stakeholders; analyzing systems flow, data consumption patterns and work processes; investigating problem areas
Make informed decisions quickly and take ownership of services and applications at scale
Document and demonstrate solution design by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, and charts
Work closely with project team members to translate requirements into a cohesive design strategy
Educational Requirements
:
BS in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Computer Information Systems or a relevant field with 5+ years of professional related experience OR 8+ years of related professional experience in lieu of a degree
